request.description: Supports pagination using `page` and `limit` query parameters. Default: page=1, limit=20. Maximum limit: 100 items per page. Can filter by active status.
Create a new review for a product. Users can only review a product once. Rating must be 1-5, comment must be 1-1000 characters.
Get all reviews for a specific product. Public endpoint, no authentication required. Returns paginated results with X-Total-Count header.
Get the current user's review for a specific product. Returns null if user hasn't reviewed the product.
Update an existing review. Users can only update their own reviews. Rating must be 1-5, comment must be 1-1000 characters.
Delete a review. Users can only delete their own reviews. Product rating will be automatically recalculated.
Admin-only endpoint to delete any review. Requires admin role. Product rating will be automatically recalculated.
